title.value: Sustainable development assessment of regional ESE-systems [eco-socio economic systems]
Оценка устойчивого развития ЭСЭ-cистем [эко-социо-экономических систем] регионов

journal.title: Problems of Economics : collection of scientific papers

person.name: Solovich, E. A., Belarus State Academy of Agriculture, Gorki (Belarus)

abstract.value: Realization of the National Strategy of Sustainable Development of Belarus for the period to 2020 with the purpose of harmonization ensuring of social, economic and ecological development in the uniform balanced complex 'person – environment – economy' defined necessity of development of the method to estimation of sustainable development of regional ESE-systems (eco-socio economic systems). The author's method of calculation of the indicator and definition of type (zone) of sustainable development of regional ESE-systems was offered. As a result of realized research it was revealed that the urgency of developing a system of indicators for sustainable development of the regions (districts) under the implementation of the National Strategy for Sustainable Development of the Republic of Belarus for the period up to 2020 due to the fact that the proposed system of indicators and practice of statistical data by the National Statistical Committee not in full made it possible to estimate the level of effective economic growth, as well as implement a multilevel and comprehensive approach to assessing the development of ESE systems in regions.
